titleStmt.title: The Academy of complements, or, A new way of wooing wherein is variety of love-letters, very fit to be read of all young men and maids, that desire to learn the true way of complements.
titleStmt.author: J. G. (John Gough), fl. 1640.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
